bwwExcerpt: And it’s a delight. Whether you’re a Neil Diamond fan, just someone who can’t help chiming in whenever you hear 'Sweet Caroline' in a crowd, or even if you roll your eyes at the idea of Adult Contemporary hits, the songs are unassailable. Diamond wrote some brilliant tunes, and Nick Fradiani, the 2015 American Idol winner, channels Diamond’s voice as well as his conflicted spirit.
